text.en: If a face-up non-Effect Monster is on the field: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. During your Main Phase, if you Synchro Summoned a Synchro Monster this turn: You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Hundred Apple Token" (Wyrm/LIGHT/Level 2/ATK 100/DEF 100). If you use this Token as Synchro Material, you can treat it as a Tuner. You can only use each effect of "Ringowurm the Hundred Apple Dragon" once per turn.
